**Transcribed file:**
**Source PDF:**

--- REMOVE BELOW ---

Example:

**Transcribed file:** markdown/six-principles/transcribed/3-the-first-principle.md
**Source PDF:** sources/William-Perkins-Works-vol-1/4-six-principles.pdf
